Cougaar 12.7
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.cougaar.planning.ldm.lps

Class Summary
AssetTransferLP AssetTransferLP is a "LogPlan Logic Provider": it provides the logic to capture PlanElements that are AssetTransfers and send AssetAssignment tasks to the proper remote agent.
ComplainingLP Watch the LogPlan and complain via logging messages when obvious errors and other suspicious patterns are detected.
ConsistencyChecker Perform some basic consistency checking on Tasks and PlanElements
DeletionLP RescindLogicProvider class provides the logic to capture rescinded PlanElements (removed from collection)
NotificationLP RescindLogicProvider class provides the logic to capture rescinded PlanElements (removed from collection)
ReceiveAssetLP take an incoming AssetAssignment Directive and add Asset to the LogPlan w/side-effect of also disseminating to other subscribers.
ReceiveAssetRescindLP Catch assets so that we can relink the relationships properly.
ReceiveAssetVerificationLP take an incoming AssetVerification Directive and confirm Asset on the LogPlan w/side-effect of also disseminating to other subscribers.
ReceiveDeletionLP take an incoming Deletion Directive and perform Modification to the LOGPLAN
ReceiveNotificationLP Take an incoming Notification Directive and perform Modification to the LOGPLAN
ReceiveRescindLP take an incoming Rescind Directive and perform Modification to the LOGPLAN 1.
ReceiveTaskLP Take an incoming Task (excepting Rescind task) and add to the LogPlan w/side-effect of also disseminating to other subscribers.
RemoteAllocationLP RemoteAllocationLP class provides the logic to capture Allocations against remote agents
RescindLP RescindLogicProvider class provides the logic to capture rescinded PlanElements (removed from collection) Attempts to do a complete LogPlan rescind walk, not depending on being re-called to do the "next" level of rescind.
RescindLP.DeferredRescind  
RoleScheduleConflictLP RoleScheduleConflictLP checks an Asset's roleschedule for potential schedule conflicts.
WorkflowAllocationLP
